document_data.name: ''Helm of Hiding''
document_data.mainbody: The '''helm of hiding''' was an [[enchanted]] [[helmet]] that hid its wearer from magical prying.
document_data.Description: It appeared to be a rather plain old war helm.
document_data.Powers: Per [[Laeral Rythkyn]], a [[Harper]] [[wizard]] of note, it prevented all mental ''[[scrying]]'' on the wearer, hid them from searching magic, and allowed them to cloak themselves in shadow on command. The rest of the [[armor]] had other properties, but they were akin to so much shaped metal.
document_data.History: Laeral Rythkyn loaned the ''helm of hiding'' to her apprentice [[Blaskyn]] when she went off to find ''[[Thalon's Throne]]'' in mid-[[Kythorn]] of the{{YearlinkName|1357}}.
